channel.title: [317] Darkscape release [317]
channel.description:
Firstly may i state that this is my first POST on this website please don't flame me..
[b]DARKSCAPE CLEINT AND SOURCE RELEASE.[/b] note: i did not edit the client much, this was all in the source.(mostly)
working d claw spec adding the correct bonues. gs's have correct bonus. shops are scattered around, great for econimy servers. Made new place where begginers start. claws specal corrected.(tiny bit overpowered) chaos element has it's own teleport. ::kbd is a safe zone for non pkers. god wars working like other servers 20 kills then graardor. Water and fire interfaces changed. fixed emotes. Fixed all dupes know to delta. ect clan chat trade glitch. removed a few unneeded customs. added a few monsters people never use, but are there. basicly turned a pk server into an econimic/pk fixed all drops for econimy to run smoothly.
[u][b][i][b]Pictures:[/b][/i][/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2rhweud.jpg[/img] these is a different one in ancients, you gotta download to figure it out :D
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/9iejxv.jpg[/img] Dragon claw specal, before u say overpowered, he had no armour on.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ics6s4.jpg[/img] new begginer teleport (100% by me)
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1256cmp.jpg[/img] cloths and runes shops.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2415wu8.jpg[/img] catherby + skiller stores.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2415wu8.jpg[/img] home pk stores + bank
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/atxll0.jpg[/img] thieving stalls (last 2 100% coded by me)
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ok663m.jpg[/img] chaos element teleport,(teleport, and new place, coded by me)
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2v00emv.jpg[/img] mithril dragon teleport (added npc spawns in that area, and teleport)
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/24csh0k.jpg[/img] also added green dragons, south of mithrils.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/vv0hs.jpg[/img] kbd for non pkers. (added kbd, added bank booths)
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/11l4znp.jpg[/img] 50% working dueling, needs some fixing, but i tryed :S
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/99fntf.jpg[/img] ags spec, felt like adding a pic lol.
Downloads client: removed source: removed
remember this is my first source let alone post. please tell if i made mistakes instead of calling me mean names and flaming me.
credits go to deltascape 90% combatscape 3% (the source, and client i used) mikecannon 7% please post if i messed up on credits, i will fix.
W000T MIKECANNONS FIRST POST.

item.description:
@mikecannon wrote:

Firstly may i state that this is my first POST on this website please don’t flame me…

                                      [b]DARKSCAPE CLEINT AND SOURCE RELEASE.[/b]

note: i did not edit the client much, this was all in the source.(mostly)

working d claw spec adding the correct bonues.
gs’s have correct bonus.
shops are scattered around, great for econimy servers.
Made new place where begginers start.
claws specal corrected.(tiny bit overpowered)
chaos element has it’s own teleport.
::kbd is a safe zone for non pkers.
god wars working like other servers 20 kills then graardor.
Water and fire interfaces changed.
fixed emotes.
Fixed all dupes know to delta. ect clan chat trade glitch.
removed a few unneeded customs.
added a few monsters people never use, but are there.
basicly turned a pk server into an econimic/pk
fixed all drops for econimy to run smoothly.

     [u][b][i][b]Pictures:[/b][/i][/b][/u]


these is a different one in ancients, you gotta download to figure it out

also added green dragons, south of mithrils.

50% working dueling, needs some fixing, but i tryed :S


ags spec, felt like adding a pic lol.
